trans-unit.source: After you define the content for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object, you must add it to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Depois de definir o conteúdo para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> do objeto, você deve adicioná-lo para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> coleção de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instância usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> cannot be used for recognition until it has been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> não pode ser usado para o reconhecimento de até que ele foi adicionado para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> coleção de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instância.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array of rule objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de objetos de regra a serem adicionados ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the contents of an array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> objects to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conteúdo de uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Any <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> object in the <paramref name="rules" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> na matriz <paramref name="rules" /> é <see langword="null" />.
